Body: I am trying to create a simulator in Cooja for the first time. I want to create a sky moto with border-router.c". At first
column9: I was using msp430-gcc-4.7 and getting the error: .text' will not fit in region rom'. Then
column11:
I upgraded to msp430-gcc-4.7.3 by following their instruction from the github repo.

Now
column12:
I can find msp430-gcc from my terminal but whenever I try to create a sky moto I get an error: "make: msp430-gcc: Command not found".

Note: I added < msp430-gcc>/bin folder in my PATH variable.
Can anyone please help?

Thanks.

"
